entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
